duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as an advocate for managing a safe worksite.
Identify and manage stakeholder dependencies and construction deliverables with various teams.
Manage lease providers and support-associated teams in the delivery of RFS for each lease site location.
Travel up to 100% of the time to data center sites.

education_certification.credential: PMP certification, LEED certification, Degrees in Construction Management or Electrical/Mechanical Engineering or similar experience, OSHA 30 or equivalent certification, Ability to read and understand commercial lease agreements
